metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7325 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, as multiple views under web/skins/classic/views insecurely utilize $_REQUEST['PHP_SELF'], without applying any proper filtration.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
